tool_description: Creates comprehensive job descriptions from basic role information, including responsibilities, qualifications, and company details.

job_title.description: The official title of the position

department.description: Department or team where the role belongs

seniority_level.description: Experience level: entry, mid, senior, lead, executive

employment_type.description: Employment type: full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, internship

company_description.description: Brief description of the company and its mission

error_messages: Invalid seniority level: Must be one of [entry, mid, senior, lead, executive].
Invalid employment type: Must be one of [full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, internship].
Invalid remote policy: Must be one of [on-site, remote, hybrid].
Missing required fields: job_title, department, seniority_level, employment_type, remote_policy, and company_name are required.
Responsibilities limit exceeded: Maximum 15 key responsibilities allowed.
usage: Provide basic job details including title, department, seniority level, employment type, remote policy, and company name. Optionally include company description, key responsibilities, and industry for more detailed output.

benefits_section.description: Standard benefits section based on role level
